Sentencas: Present review is aimed at providing a state-of-art development of anode for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with principal emphasis on the materials aspect.
Titulo: A review on the status of anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The criteria for the anode of SOFC are first presented.
Titulo: A review on the status of anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The prospects and problems of the currently developed anode materials are elucidated.
Titulo: A review on the status of anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In particular, the electrochemical properties of the Ni/YSZ cermet anode that is the most commonly employed in the establishment of SOFC stack is described along with various approaches attempted for their improvements.
Titulo: A review on the status of anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The advantages and disadvantages of other anode materials are compared to offer some insights for the research and development of new generation of anode materials for SOFC.
Titulo: A review on the status of anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells
A review on the status of anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells
